entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this evening. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
